Keywords: Amazon , Deity , Trinity , Warrior
Real Name: Diana
Special Powers
PRINCESS OF THEMYSCIRA: Wonder Woman may start the game with any Wonder Woman Equipment equipped.
SHIFTING FOCUS: WONDER WOMAN: FREE: If Wonder Woman began your turn on the map, replace her with another character with this trait. // When Wonder Woman uses Shifting Focus: Wonder Woman while equipped with a Wonder Woman Equipment, remove that object from the game and don't score it instead of unequipping it.
PROTECTOR OF THE INNOCENT: Defend, Toughness.

Comments
August 15, 2021
SpaceTitanium
Plenty of reason to swap out, the other 2 both have higher base damage than this which (BCF rolls can and do go wrong), the rare has a better reducer and higher attack top dial (barring the armor which you lose when swapping around), the common has higher up close defence, team utility and 2 targets. The entire point of shifting focus is that each one does something different the others don't, the superman/batman ones are a bit more easily delineated between range/close/support/movement while the diana ones all have a bit of everything that counter eachother in interesting ways.
May 12, 2021
brainiacFTW
[QUOTE=deathtrooper744;12123683]Yeah, but if you pull her and her wings, there is little to no reason to ever play the other versions of her.[/QUOTE] I would definitely still play the rare for that defense debuff. It can be super powerful in the right situation.
March 25, 2021
Brundun94
Actually, i would say there's a decent reason to play the other SF pieces; at least the common. 001 + Hippolyta permit the ability to summon a small force of Amazon warriors. Antiope/Artemis/Nubia are great for screening rounds 1-3 until a few warriors are ready. At which point you switch out for this version to lead a terrifying, 19dv defended, sidekick friendly, stampede! Not meta by any means, but definitely plays/feels thematic.

March 15, 2021
deathtrooper744
Looking at her dial and at the Wonder Woman Equipment, as well as the other shifting foucs options, this is a very good dial. BCF for high damage, 19 Defend, Full dial super senses on a six, Invuln with the wings, with Max 1 damage on click 1, as well as 19 defense for 5 out of 7 clicks, capping off with regen at the end. All in all, a solid Eagle Armor Wonder Woman.
